                    <div class="baoliao-block">
            <div class="name one-line">爆料原文：</div><p itemprop="description">【京东采销吐血放送！】<br>话费党狂喜！京东采销老哥自砍一刀！无门槛话费券+5折充100话费券+腾讯/爱奇艺月卡三连暴击！<br>原价100的话费现在实付50直接到账！白嫖热门视频会员！超市排队充值的冤种行为可以停了！<br>手慢无！这波库存就5000份！今晚12点准时下架！<br>猛戳采销保真链接立薅<br>https://jdcs.jd.com/xxxxxx</p>        </div>
              <div class="baoliao-block">  </div>

                                      <em></em>标签：话费充值                                                                            <span class="corner-btn J_user_focus" data-type="tag" data-cate-id="501430" data-cate="话费充值" data-follow="" onclick="dataLayer.push({'event':'1210007','type':'tag','tag':'话费充值'});sensors.track('DetailModelClick', {'business':'好价','model_name':'本文收录在','sub_model_name':'tag','button_name':'话费充值有好价'})" data-cid="2" data-atp="3" data-tagid="0" data-position="" data-isdetail="1" data-detail="1" data-aid="143573586"><i class="icon-plus-o-thin"></i>关注</span>
